articles.title: India's first openly gay sprinter Dutee Chand posts photo with girlfriend, sparks marriage rumours - India Today
articles.description: India's first openly gay athlete Dutee Chand took to Twitter to post a photo with her girlfriend Monalisa. Chand had earlier spoken about how her family did not take things kindly when she came out as gay.
